amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the requirement for a 25 percent match by States for weatherization assistance grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 15 and printed in the Congressional Record to strike the requirement for a 25 percent cost share by states for weatherization assistance grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 285).
